senses.sense_definition: Existing or occurring before the formation or establishment of a political state.

examples.text: Anthropologists study <w>prestate</w> societies to understand the evolution of governance.
The region remained in a <w>prestate</w> condition for centuries before the empire expanded.

senses.sense_definition: The condition or status of a system or entity before a specific process or operation takes place.

examples.text: The algorithm must verify the <w>prestate</w> of the variable before execution begins.
If the <w>prestate</w> is invalid, the function will return an error immediately.

senses.sense_definition: To provide a guarantee or security against loss or legal liability.

examples.text: The contract required the guarantor to <w>prestate</w> the obligation fully.
They agreed to <w>prestate</w> any damages that might occur during the transition.
